es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel
Class Resource

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.SimulationObject
      es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.VariableStoreSimulationObject
          es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.TimeStampedSimulationObject
              es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.BasicElement
                  es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.Resource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Debuggable, Describable, Identifiable, Resource, SimulationObject, VariableStore, VariableStoreSimulationObject, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>
public class Resource
extends BasicElement
implements Resource

A resource is an element that becomes available at a specific simulation time and becomes unavailable at other simulation time. The availability of a resource is controlled by means of timetable entries, which define a resource type and an availability cycle. A resource finishes its execution when it has no longer valid timetable entries. TODO Comment

Author:
Carlos Martín Galán

init

protected void init()
Launches the events corresponding to the timetable entries. If no valid entry is found, this resource finishes its execution.

addRole

protected void addRole(ResourceType role,
                       long ts)
Adds a new resource type to the list of current roles. If the list already contains an entry for the resource type, the greater timestamp is added.

Parameters:
role - New resource type added
ts - Timestamp when the availability of this resource finishes for this resource type.

removeRole

protected void removeRole(ResourceType role)
Removes a resource type from the list of current roles. If the role doesn't exist the removal is silently skipped (that's because a resource can have several timetable entries for the same role, but the currentRoles list only contains one entry per role). However, checks if it's time for removing the role before doing it.

Parameters:
role - Resource type removed

notifyCurrentManagers

protected void notifyCurrentManagers()
Notifies all the activity managers using this resource that it has become available.

inSeveralManagers

protected boolean inSeveralManagers()
Returns true if the resource is being used from multiple activity managers.

Returns:
True if the resource is being used from multiple activity managers; false otherwise.

add2Solution

protected boolean add2Solution(ResourceType rt,
                               WorkItem wi)
Tentatively adds this resource to a solution built to carry out an activity. First checks if this resource is not being using yet in another solution.

Parameters:
rt - Resource type to be assigned in this solution
wi - Work item trying to catch this resource
Returns:
True if this resource can be used in the solution; false otherwise.

removeFromSolution

protected void removeFromSolution(WorkItem wi)
Removes this resource from a solution it was tentatively added to.

Parameters:
wi - Work item which won't use this resource to carry out an activity.

checkSolution

protected boolean checkSolution(WorkItem wi)
Checks if this resource, which was tentatively added to a solution, is still valid, i.e. has not been used to carry out another activity.

Parameters:
wi - Work item trying to catch this resource
Returns:
True if this resource is still valid for a solution; false otherwise.

addBook

protected void addBook(WorkItem wi,
                       ResourceType rt)
Makes a reservation on this resource. This step is required when a resource is being used from several activity managers.

Parameters:
wi - The work item booking this resource
rt - The resource type to be assigned to this resource.

removeBook

protected void removeBook(WorkItem wi)
Releases a reservation previously made on this resource. This step is required when a resource is being used from several activity managers.

Parameters:
wi - The work item releasing the book over this resource.

isBooked

protected boolean isBooked(WorkItem wi)
Checks if this resource is currently booked by the specified work item.

Parameters:
wi - Work item which may have booked this resource
Returns:
True if this resource is currently booked by the specified work item

catchResource

protected long catchResource(WorkItem wi)
Definitely takes this resource by setting its current work item. If the resource was booked, the reservation is released.

Parameters:
wi - The work item which an element is executing
Returns:
The availability timestamp of this resource for this resource type

releaseResource

protected boolean releaseResource()
Releases this resource. If the resource has already expired its availability time, the timeOut flag is set off. Sets the current work item and the current resource type to null.

Returns:
True if the resource could be correctly released. False if the availability time of the resource had already expired.

generateCancelPeriodOffEvent

public void generateCancelPeriodOffEvent(long ts,
                                         long duration)
Generates an event which finalizes a period of unavailability.

Parameters:
ts - Current simulation time.
duration - Duration of the unavailability period.

protected WorkItem getCurrentWI()
Returns the work item of the element which currently owns this resource.

Returns:
The current work item.

public ResourceType getCurrentResourceType()
Returns the current resource type this resource is being used for.

Returns:
Current resource type of this resource

isTimeOut

protected boolean isTimeOut()
Returns true if this resource is being used in spite of having finished its availability.

Returns:
True if this resource is being used in spite of having finished its availability; false otherwise.

setTimeOut

protected void setTimeOut(boolean timeOut)
Sets the state of this resource as being used in spite of having finished its availability.

Parameters:
timeOut - True if this resource is being used beyond its availability; false otherwise.
